overview: There's no simple formula for becoming a larger-than-life figure, but all the artists on Legends 2 have that certain "it" factor. The master singer Marty Robbins performs his first No. 1 hit, I'll Go On Alone. Duets by Porter Wagoner and Dolly Parton, George Jones and Tammy Wynette, and Conway Twitty and Loretta Lynn, double the star power. Not to be outdone, Johnny Cash unleashes a five-song medley guaranteed to rivet you to your seat.
title: Opry Video Classics: Legends 2
